title: Scheduling CRUD Controller
description:
Implement Visit Scheduling Controller with Conflict Detection and Staff Availability

Build a robust controller that handles visit scheduling requests while preventing booking conflicts and validating staff availability in real-time.

Requirements:
- Create endpoint(s) for scheduling new visits with date, time, duration, and assigned staff
- Implement conflict detection logic to prevent double-booking of staff members
- Check staff availability against their working hours/shifts before confirming visits
- Validate that requested time slots don't overlap with existing visits for the same staff
- Handle timezone considerations if staff/visits span multiple regions
- Return clear error messages when conflicts are detected (which staff, what time, existing booking details)
- Support querying available time slots for specific staff members
- Ensure atomic operations to prevent race conditions when multiple bookings occur simultaneously
- Include validation for business rules (minimum visit duration, advance booking requirements, etc.)
- Add appropriate error handling for edge cases (staff not found, invalid time ranges, past dates)

Technical Considerations:
- Use database transactions or locking mechanisms to ensure data consistency
- Optimize queries to efficiently check conflicts across potentially large visit datasets
- Consider caching staff schedules if they're frequently accessed
- Add logging for debugging scheduling conflicts and availability issues
